conditions.description: Match if a temperature has changed for a certain captor and a temperature event
conditions.fn: function(event, eventType, eventSourceInstance) { return event.temperature.old != event.temperature.new; }

conditions.description: Match if a temperature has changed for any captor and a temperature event
conditions.fn: function(event, eventType, eventSourceInstance) { return event.temperature.old != event.temperature.new; }

conditions.description: Match if a temperature has changed for a specific captor and any event from this captor
conditions.fn: function(event, eventType, eventSourceInstance) { return event.captorId == 42 || event.captorId == 53; }

transformations.description: Transform the event of the specific type for the slack action target with the specific action type.
transformations.fn: function(event, eventType, actionType, actionTargetInstance) { return { message: 'The temp. changed from ' + event.temperature.old + ' to ' + event.temperature.new + '.' }; }

transformations.description: Transform the event for the slack action target with the specific action type.
transformations.fn: function(event, eventType, actionType, actionTargetInstance) { return { message: 'The captor ' + event.captorId + ' has sent an event of ' + eventType.name + '.' }; }
